binding:binding.name: Xiaomi Mi IO Binding
binding:binding.description: Binding for Xiaomi Mi IO devices like Mi Robot Vacuum

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Xiaomi cloud username
parameter.description: Xiaomi cloud username. Typically your email

parameter.name: country
parameter.label: Xiaomi server country
parameter.description: Xiaomi server country(s) (e.g. sg,de). Separate multiple servers with comma. Leave empty for all. See binding readme for country to server mapping

parameter.name: cloudDiscoveryMode
parameter.label: Cloud Discovery Mode
parameter.description: Allow for discovery via the cloud. This may be used for devices that are not on the same network as OpenHAB server

options.option: Discover online supported devices from Xiaomi cloud
Discover all online devices from Xiaomi cloud
